text.__SUMMARY__:
Inga allenii is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae.
It is found in Colombia, Costa Rica, and Panama.
It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.References: Mitré, M. (1998). "Inga allenii". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T32659A9721749. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T32659A9721749.en. Retrieved 19 December 2017.
